title: FOOLs - Những Kẻ Khờ
overview: FOOLs - Những Kẻ Khờ brings you back to the final moments of the path called youth before the turning point of life. There is joy, sorrow, and remains aching is the feeling of regret. Regrets held in the late confession, in the selfish decisions. Regrets in the one sided love that cannot seem to put into words.
